column4: Is it possible to keep packages from upgrading? I upgraded to the Gibbon kernel, 2.6.22-9 and now apt-get is wanting me to "upgrade" to 2.6.20-16.
did you change your /etc/apt/sources.list file from feisty to gutsy? or did you not want to upgrade the whole os just the kernel
when I upgraded to the Gutsy kernel, I had the repo enabled. It isnt now.
Im just going to "upgrade" to the Feisty kernel and edit my menu.lst so the new kernel still loads
